blocks.name: csrg
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all semirings.
blocks.origin: const class csrg { SRing }

blocks.name: diff.csrg.s
diff.csrg.c
diff.csrg.w
df-srg
blocks.content: Define class of all semirings. A semiring is a set equipped with two everywhere-defined internal operations, whose first one is an additive commutative monoid structure and the second one is a multiplicative monoid structure, and where multiplication is (left- and right-) distributive over addition. Compared to the definition of a ring, this definition also adds that the additive identity is an absorbing element of the multiplicative law, as this cannot be deduced from distributivity alone. Definition of [Golan] p. 1. Note that our semirings are unital. Such semirings are sometimes called "rigs", being "rings without negatives". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:

  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ c5 =(√ó ` c0)
} = {
  jca((c0 ‚àà SRing ‚àß(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c2)), (c1[c5](c3[c6]c4))=((c1[c5]c3)[c6](c1[c5]c4)), ((c1[c6]c3)[c5]c4)=((c1[c5]c4)[c6](c3[c5]c4)))

  caovdirg(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c2, c3, c4, c2, c6, c5, c6, c0 ‚àà SRing)
  simprd((c0 ‚àà SRing ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß hs2 ‚àà c2)), ((hs0[c6]hs1)[c5]hs2)=((hs0[c5]hs2)[c6](hs1[c5]hs2)), (hs0[c5](hs1[c6]hs2))=((hs0[c5]hs1)[c6](hs0[c5]hs2)))

  simpld((c0 ‚àà SRing ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà c2,((hs0[c5](hs1[c6]hs2))=((hs0[c5]hs1)[c6](hs0[c5]hs2))‚àß((hs0[c6]hs1)[c5]hs2)=((hs0[c5]hs2)[c6](hs1[c5]hs2))))), (((0 ` c0)[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c0)‚àß(hs0[c5](0 ` c0))=(0 ` c0)))

thm srgideu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, csrg), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, csrg), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd))
  srgmgp(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  mndideu(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c2)
  mgpbas(c1, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  mgpplusg(c2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
}

thm srgfcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà SRing ‚àß c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2))‚Üí(c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Üí c2))

  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà SRing ‚àß c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2)), ran(c1)‚äÜ c2, c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(c2 √ó c2),(c1 ` hs0)‚àà c2))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà SRing, c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2))

  3expb(c0 ‚àà SRing, hs1 ‚àà c2, hs2 ‚àà c2, (hs1[c1]hs2)‚àà c2)
  srgcl(c0, hs1, c2, hs2, c1)

  fveq2(hs0, < hs1, hs2 >, c1)

thm srgidmlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, csrg), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c1)), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmnd))

blocks.name: srgisid
blocks.content: In a semiring, the only left-absorbing element is the additive identity. Remark in [Golan] p. 1. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-May-2018.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1)), diffsc(s0, c3))

  srg0cl(c3, c1, c2)
  rspcv(s0, c1, c2, wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(co(c0, c4, c1), c0))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(s0)), c0, co(c0, c4, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c1, c0, c4)

blocks.name: srgen1zr
blocks.content: The only semiring with one element is the zero ring (at least if its operations are internal binary operations). (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2010.) (Revised by AV, 25-Jan-2020.)

} = {

blocks.name: srgpcomp
blocks.content: If two elements of a semiring commute, they also commute if one of the elements is raised to a higher power. (Contributed by AV, 23-Aug-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm srgpcomp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(c0, c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmgp, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, csrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c4, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c4)))
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(c0, c1, c2))), wcel(c0, cn0))
  nn0ind(hs0, hs1, c0, wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(c0, c1, c2)))), wi(w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2)))), wi(w0, wceq(co(co(nat0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(nat0, c1, c2)))), wi(w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs1), c1, c2)))), wi(w0, wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2))), wceq(co(co(nat0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(nat0, c1, c2))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), co(co(nat0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(nat0, c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4, co(nat0, c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq2d(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), co(nat0, c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), nat0, c1, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs1), c1, c2))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), co(co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs1), c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4, co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2d(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(cv(hs0), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(cv(hs0), c1, c2)), co(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))

  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2)
  eqtrd(co(co(nat0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(nat0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(cur, c6), c3, c4), w0)
  oveq1d(co(nat0, c1, c2), c3, c4, cfv(cur, c6), w0)
  3eqtr4rd(co(cfv(cur, c6), c3, c4), co(c4, c3, co(nat0, c1, c2)), co(c4, c3, cfv(cur, c6)), c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c4, c3, cfv(cur, c6)), c4), wcel(c6, csrg), wcel(c4, c5))
  srgridm(c6, c4, c5, c3, cfv(cur, c6))
  oveq2d(c4, c3, co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cur, c6), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cur, c6)), wcel(c2, c5))
  mulg0(c2, c5, c1, cfv(cur, c6), c7)
  ringidval(cfv(cur, c6), c7, c6)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cur, c6), c3, c4), c4), wcel(c6, csrg), wcel(c4, c5))
  srglidm(c6, c4, c5, cfv(cur, c6), c3)
